title: The Ghost Fucker: Hung like a Dead Man
description: Katrina Nightingale's rare gift lets her see ghosts, touch ghosts, and even fuck ghosts. When a man accidentally kills himself with auto-erotic asphyxiation, Katrina is called to the scene and finds that this tormented spirit is hung in more ways than one! Explicit and graphic sex scenes. 3400 words, M/F, supernatural, masturbation, strangling.
author: Fannie Tucker
